Posts.Content: Believe4Life wrote: Afatinib I just read that the FDA today approved this drug for non-small cell lung cancer, but that it also has potential in HER2+ breast and gastric cancers. http://chicago2013.asco.org/education-session-looks-beyond-trastuzumab-and-lapatinib-treatment-her2-breast-cancer Surgery 10/15/2007 Lumpectomy: Left; Lymph node removal: Left, Sentinel, Underarm/Axillary Targeted Therapy 11/19/2007 Herceptin (trastuzumab) Chemotherapy 11/19/2007 Carboplatin (Paraplatin), Taxotere (docetaxel) Hormonal Therapy 5/26/2008 Arimidex (anastrozole) Log in to post a reply
